articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: ‘The First Descendant’ Is Not A Great Game, I’m Loving It - Forbes
articles.description: The First Descendant made such a poor initial impression on me I almost quit within the first few hours. It's not great, yet I am loving it all the same. Why?
articles.content:
The First Descendant
Nexon
The First Descendant made such a poor initial impression on me I almost quit within the first few hours. It seemed bland, repetitive and a Warframe clone to such an exten… [+3379 chars]
